TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LoginViewDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner

summary.span: 在可视化设计器中为 Web 服务器控件提供设计时支持。

span.span: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the Web server control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件呈现是否用户登录到托管网站，以及包含登录的用户帐户的角色取决于其模板之一。The control renders one of its templates, determined by whether a user is logged on to the host Web site, and the roles that contain the logged-on user account. 在可视化设计器中，当从源视图切换到设计视图中，标记源代码描述控件进行分析，并在设计图面上创建控件的设计时版本。In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes the control is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface. 当你切换回源视图时，设计时控件的标记源代码持久保存，并编辑向网页上的标记。When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to the markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page. 类提供设计时支持控件。The class provides design-time support for the control. 属性返回对象，它通常包含一个对象，派生自的继承树中的每个级别的设计器类。The property returns a object, which typically contains an object that is derived from the class for each level in the inheritance tree of the designer. 属性返回的模板的关联的模板组集合控件。The property returns a collection of template groups for the templates of the associated control. 属性始终返回`true`，，该值指示设计器将创建关联的临时副本控件来生成设计时标记。The property always returns `true`, indicating that the designer creates a temporary copy of the associated control to generate the design-time markup. 类方法提供以下功能：The class methods provide the following functionality: - 方法返回用于呈现关联的标记控件在设计时。The methods return the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time. 方法获取在当前模板以外的设计时呈现关联控件的占位符的标记。The method gets the markup that renders a placeholder for the associated control at design time when the current template is not defined. 方法提供了在发生错误时的设计时呈现关联的控件的标记。The method provides the markup that renders the associated control at design time when an error has occurred. - 方法返回序列化的副本关联的当前模板控件。The method returns a serialized copy of the current template for the associated control. 方法将关联控件的区域设置从控件模板的序列化副本。The method sets a region of the associated control from a serialized copy of a control template. - 方法准备设计器，以查看、 编辑和设计关联控件。The method prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control. 到关联的控件的更改时调用方法。The method is called when there is a change to the associated control. 方法用于移除属性、 添加其他属性，或者隐藏关联控件的属性。The method is used to remove properties from, add additional properties to, or shadow properties of the associated control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何扩展类更改的外观和行为的派生自的控件控件在设计时。The following code example shows how to extend the class to change the appearance and behavior of controls that are derived from the control at design time. 该示例从`MyLoginView`控件从。The example derives the `MyLoginView` control from the . `MyLoginView`是一份控件。The `MyLoginView` is a copy of the control. 该示例还从`MyLoginViewDesigner`类类并将应用属性，则为`MyLoginViewDesigner`上`MyLoginView`控件。The example also derives the `MyLoginViewDesigner` class from the class and applies a attribute for the `MyLoginViewDesigner` on the `MyLoginView` control. `MyLoginViewDesigner`控件重写以下成员：The `MyLoginViewDesigner` control overrides the following members: - 方法来执行属性显示在**属性**网格在设计时。The method to make the property visible in the **Properties** grid at design time. - 方法，以便绘制控件以使其范围更明显周围橙色边框。The method to draw an orange border around the control to make its extent more visible. - 方法来生成标记为包含错误消息，从而以红色呈现时，占位符显示为粗体文本。The method to generate the markup for a placeholder that includes the error message, which is rendered in red, bold text. - 方法来生成标记为包含为控件定义的角色组的名称的占位符。The method to generate the markup for a placeholder that contains the names of the role groups that are defined for the control. - 方法会引发异常，如果不是关联的控件`MyLoginView`对象。The method to throw an exception, if the associated control is not a `MyLoginView` object. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner/CS/LoginViewDesigner.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner/VB/LoginViewDesigner.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取用于在设计时呈现关联控件的标记。

returns.span: 一个字符串，其中包含用于在设计时呈现 的标记。

span.span: A string containing the markup used to render the at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法设置的关联的模板索引控件重新创建到当前的设计时索引，然后会导致关联的控件和绑定其子控件，如有必要的数据。The method sets the template index of the associated control to the current design-time index, and then causes the associated control to recreate and data bind its child controls, if necessary. 接下来，调用基方法来生成标记。Next, the calls the base method to generate the markup. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写继承自的类方法类，以更改派生自的控件的外观类在设计时。The following code example shows how to override the method in a class that is inherited from the class to change the appearance of a control that is derived from the class at design time. 该示例将绘制控件以使其范围更明显周围橙色边框。The example draws an orange border around the control to make its extent more visible. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner/CS/LoginViewDesigner.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner/VB/LoginViewDesigner.vb#4)]

para.span: 如果你重写方法，一定要调用基方法它最终，经过多级重写，因为调用上控件或控件来生成标记的副本。

span.span: If you override the method, be sure to call the base method because it eventually, through several override levels, calls on the control or a copy of the control to generate the markup.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法创建对象模板编辑区域上的可视化设计器图面，然后初始化它作为模板。The method creates an object for a template editing area on the visual designer surface, and then initializes it as a template. 如果未定义模板，则显示一个字符串，会提示你单击以开始编辑。If no templates are defined, a string is displayed that prompts you to click to begin editing. 使用预定义的常量来生成返回的标记。A predefined constant is used to generate the returned markup. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写继承自的类方法类，以更改派生自的控件的外观类在设计时。The following code example shows how to override the method in a class that is inherited from the class to change the appearance of a control that is derived from the class at design time. 该示例将绘制控件以使其范围更明显周围橙色边框。The example draws an orange border around the control to make its extent more visible. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner/CS/LoginViewDesigner.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner/VB/LoginViewDesigner.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果模板实现接口可以从获取`region`参数，方法返回持久化的模板。If a template implementing the interface can be obtained from the `region` parameter, the method returns the persisted template. 否则，它会调用基方法来生成的内容。Otherwise, it calls the base method to generate the content. 序列化的模板可以还原到控件通过使用方法。The serialized template can be restored to the control by using the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法首先设置一个指定的关联的当前模板的名称的字符串消息的格式控制，并且还指定该模板为空。The method first formats a string message that specifies the name of the current template of the associated control and also specifies that the template is empty. 则为包含该消息的占位符生成标记。Then the generates the markup for a placeholder containing that message. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写继承自的类方法类，以更改派生自的控件的外观类在设计时。The following code example shows how to override the method in a class that is inherited from the class to change the appearance of a control that is derived from the class at design time. 该示例为一个占位符，包括所有的名称生成标记为关联的控件定义的对象。The example generates the markup for a placeholder that includes the names of all the objects that are defined for the associated control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 错误设计时控件呈现为包含类型名称、 控件名称和公告和描述错误的消息的面板。The error design-time control renders as a panel that contains the type name, the control name, and messages announcing and describing the error. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写继承自的类方法类，以更改派生自的控件的外观类在设计时。The following code example shows how to override the method in a class that is inherited from the class to change the appearance of a control that is derived from the class at design time. 该示例为一个占位符，包括错误消息，从而以红色、 粗体文本呈现生成标记。The example generates the markup for a placeholder that includes the error message, which is rendered in red, bold text. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner/CS/LoginViewDesigner.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner/VB/LoginViewDesigner.vb#2)]

span.span: Prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在可视化设计器调用方法准备设计器用于呈现时控件。The visual designer calls the method when it is ready to use the designer to render the control. 其基方法配置属性，并设置所需的设计器操作的事件。The and its base methods configure properties and set up events that are necessary for the operation of the designer. `component`参数是与此设计器或一份相关联的控件控件。The `component` parameter is the control that is associated with this designer or a copy of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写继承自的类方法类更改派生自的控件的行为类在设计时。The following code example shows how to override the method in a class that is inherited from the class to change the behavior of a control that is derived from the class at design time. 本示例将引发，如果不是关联的控件`MyLoginView`对象。The example throws an , if the associated control is not a `MyLoginView` object. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner/CS/LoginViewDesigner.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner/VB/LoginViewDesigner.vb#6)]

summary.span: 与此设计器关联的控件发生更改时调用。

span.span: Called when there is a change to the control that is associated with this designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法调用时关联的事件控件执行。The method is called when the event of the associated control executes. 通常，这是为了响应在控件上的属性更改 (例如，**属性**网格更改)。Typically, this is in response to a property change on the control (for example, a **Properties** grid change). 如果更改控件模板，**属性**刷新网格。If the control template is changed, the **Properties** grid is refreshed. 验证是否有效，当前模板索引，然后调用基方法。The verifies that the current template index is valid, and then calls the base method.

span.span: Used by the designer to remove properties from or add properties to the display in the **Properties** grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件设计器使用派生自的方法方法隐藏各种控件属性，用相应的设计时属性设计器实现，并将添加到属性或删除属性从**属性**网格。Control designers use methods that are derived from the method to shadow various control properties with corresponding design-time properties that the designer implements, and to add properties to or remove properties from the **Properties** grid. 方法适用属性属性，以便它未出现在**属性**网格。The method applies the attribute of the property so that it does not appear in the **Properties** grid. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写继承自的类方法类更改**属性**网格控件派生自的类在设计时间。The following code example shows how to override the method in a class that is inherited from the class to change the **Properties** grid of a control that is derived from the class at design time. 示例使属性显示在**属性**网格。The example makes the property visible in the **Properties** grid. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner/CS/LoginViewDesigner.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner/VB/LoginViewDesigner.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法分析的关联的序列化的模板由指定的控件`content`参数，然后使用模板来更新由指定的控件的区域和属性`region`参数。The method parses a serialized template for the associated control that is specified by the `content` parameter, and then uses the template to update the region of the control that is specified by the property of the `region` parameter. 当前模板可以使用序列化控件方法。The current template of the control can be serialized using the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可以获取对象基类的属性，并将对象，包含单个对于匿名模板 （它对应于在没有用户登录），对象为登录的模板，以及对于每种中的元素的关联集合控制转移到。The property gets a object from the base property, and then adds objects that contain a single object for the anonymous template (which corresponds to no user logged on), for the logged-on template, and for each element in the collection of the associated control to the . 返回此给调用方。The returns this to the caller.

summary.span: 获取一个值，指示设计器是否应使用临时副本取代与设计器关联的实际控件来生成设计时标记。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the designer should use a temporary copy rather than the actual control that is associated with the designer to generate the design-time markup.
Always .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因为属性始终是`true`，设计器属性返回的关联副本控件来生成设计时标记。Because the property is always `true`, the designer property returns a copy of the associated control to generate the design-time markup. 属性通过保存的实际创建副本控件，然后再分析的持久化的控制字符串。The property creates the copy by persisting the actual control, then parsing the persisted control string. 复制的控件不会影响任何持久性的实际。The copied control does not affect any persistence for the actual . 如果属性已被重写以返回`false`，设计器将使用关联控件本身来生成设计时标记，并对控件的设计时更改将保存到页标记源。If the property has been overridden to return `false`, the designer will use the associated control itself to generate the design-time markup, and design-time changes to the control will persist to the page markup source.

para.span: 您可以重写属性以返回或者想要确定基于是否将控件标记具有类级别其值属性。

span.span: You can override the property to return or to determine its value based on whether the control is marked with a class level attribute.
If the is not overridden, the ignores the .
